name: 3 Guerra Mundial
overview:
III Guerra Mundial (World War III) is a version of the popular table game Risk, created by Albert Lamorisse in 1950 and adquired by Parker Brothers in 1958.
It's a really fun game, wich I have been played a lot of hours during my youth.

You could play alone or with a friend, remembering faithfully the table game... One bad thing: it is in Spanish but, why not learning the third important language in the world to play this commercial quality game?
